text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for AAA gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The build material is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HP Pavilion 15-cx0010ca 15.6" Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Bilingual Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Fortnite. The build quality of the HP Pavilion 15-cx0010ca 15.6" Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Bilingual Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games. The NVIDIA GTX 1050 in the HP Pavilion 15-cx0010ca 15.6" Intel Core i5 8th Gen 8300H (2.30 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 8 GB Memory 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Bilingual Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
